Definition at line 599 of file spi_sdcard.c.

uint8_t crc_7 ( uint8_t  old_crc,
uint8_t  data 
)

Calculate CRC-7 as required by SD specification.

Parameters:
[in] - old_crc: 0x00 to start new CRC or value from previous call to continue.
  • data: data byte to add to CRC computation
Returns:
CRC-7 checksum which MUST be augmented by crc_7augment() before used

Definition at line 208 of file spi_sdcard.c.

uint8_t crc_7final ( uint8_t  old_crc  ) 

Provides the zero-padding final step to CRC-7.

Parameters:
[in] - old_crc: value from last crc_7()call
Returns:
Finalized CRC-7 checksum

Definition at line 228 of file spi_sdcard.c.

void CS_Force ( int32_t  state  ) 

Drive CS output pin to low/high level to select slave device via /CS pin state.

Parameters:
[in] state State of CS output pin that will be driven:
  • 0: Drive CS pin to low level
  • 1: Drive CS pin to high level
Returns:
None

Definition at line 272 of file spi_sdcard.c.

uint32_t SD_SendReceiveData_Polling ( void *  tx_buf,
void *  rx_buf,
uint32_t  length 
)

Send/receive data over SPI bus.

Parameters:
[in] - tx_buf: pointer to transmit buffer. NULL if send 0xFF.
  • rx_buf: pointer to receive buffer NULL if nothing to receive.
  • length: number of data to send or receive
    Returns:
    the actual data sent or received.

Definition at line 250 of file spi_sdcard.c.

sd_error SD_WaitDeviceIdle ( uint32_t  num_char  ) 

Wait for SD card idle.

Parameters:
[in] - num_char: number characters (8 bits clock) to wait
Returns:
device already in idle state or need more time

Definition at line 355 of file spi_sdcard.c.

sd_error SD_WaitR1 ( uint8_t *  buffer,
uint32_t  length,
uint32_t  timeout 
)

Wait for SD card R1 response.

Parameters:
[in] - buffer: pointer to receive buffer
  • length: length of receive data, must equal 1+actual length of data length = 0 if receive R1 only
    • timeout: timeout for retry
Returns:
error code
